key_events.description: ITSA4 has a dividend yield of 12.52% and is expected to continue paying interesting dividends until the end of 2026. Extraordinary dividends were paid to avoid 10% dividend taxation in 2026.
Capital increase with bonus shares was approved, increasing capital to R$ 83,689,000,000.00. 219,876,212 new shares were issued.
Itaúsa has significantly reduced its net debt by more than 25% to less than R$ 700 million.

Itaúsa reported a recurring net profit above R$ 4 billion in the most recent quarter, an annual growth of approximately 6%. Accumulated profit for the year exceeds R$ 15 billion. Recurring ROE is around 18%.

Shareholders received 2 new shares for every 100 held on the position of 2025-12-18. New shares from bonification were credited on 2025-12-23. The cost attributed to the bonus shares is R$ 11.370033972 per share.

risk_factors: Valuation models place ITSA4 between R$ 12.75 and R$ 13.12, which is below the current price of R$ 13.84.

investment_thesis.bull_case: Itaúsa's strong dividend yield (12.52%), significant capital increase, debt reduction, and consistent profitability make it an attractive investment. The company's recurring net profit above R$ 4 billion and accumulated profit exceeding R$ 15 billion demonstrate financial strength.
investment_thesis.bear_case: Despite positive indicators, ITSA4's valuation based on InvestingPro's model suggests it might be slightly overvalued at its current price of R$ 13.84, as the model places it between R$ 12.75 and R$ 13.12.

summary_markdown: ITSA4 exhibits a bullish sentiment driven by a high dividend yield of 12.52%, a capital increase to R$ 83,689,000,000.00, and a net debt reduction of over 25% to below R$ 700 million. The company reported a recurring net profit above R$ 4 billion in the last quarter, with an accumulated profit exceeding R$ 15 billion. Shareholders received bonus shares on 2025-12-23, with a cost of R$ 11.370033972 per share. However, InvestingPro's valuation model places ITSA4 between R$ 12.75 and R$ 13.12, slightly below the current price of R$ 13.84.
